Text: The hard coded subs killed it for me.... If your looking for a clean edition, this isnt it.

Right on... we need a "clean" version.

I'm looking for the Devil Doll segment....
It doesn't have "hard coded" subs, this is a clean edition and you can paste whatever subs you want to in any language, yes it has spanish subtitles but they are in a srt file, not in the movie!!!!
